page.title: 19Nether Dallachy Whitehills
page.content: Nether Dallachy and Kirkhill (Pp 17/18) are {typical of and cover {roughly half the arable farming ground {of the block.} Nether Dallachy consists of 170 acres, farmed as follows: 30 acres spring barley 35 acres winter barley 25 acres wheat 8 acres seed potatoes{(for Algeria { Morocco and Portugal) 15 acres turnips 30 acres grass (grazing) 20 acres grass for hay Turnips and Hay are for the{Animal {Crop}which is 40 cattle off grass sold July/Sept.40 cattle fed inside sold Nov./March, 90 ewes producing 160 fat lambs{(foxes got 15 lambs last year) Cattle cost Â£350/420 selling at Â£580/620. Ewes cost Â£80 as gimmers, 3 years later sold for Â£40. Lambs Â£50 .
